heading: ISC Class 12 â€“ Your Path to Academic Excellence
subHeading: Comprehensive preparation for ISC board exams with stream-specific resources and career guidance.
quickIntro: ISC Class 12 is a crucial academic milestone that shapes your future. Our comprehensive resources help you excel in board exams with structured learning, practice tests, and performance analysis. Choose your stream - Science, Commerce, or Humanities - and access tailored study materials for success.

infoBox.target: ISC Board Exams, Competitive Exams, College Admissions
infoBox.questions: Chapter-wise questions, sample papers, previous year papers

featuresSection.title: Your Complete ISC Class 12 Preparation Kit
featuresSection.subtitle: Stream-specific resources and exam-focused preparation for outstanding results.

examFeatures.title: Stream-wise Study Material
examFeatures.benefit: Comprehensive notes for all subjects in your chosen stream.
examFeatures.why: Aligned with latest ISC syllabus and exam pattern.

examFeatures.title: Previous Year Papers
examFeatures.benefit: Access to last 10 years' solved papers.
examFeatures.why: Understand exam pattern and frequently asked questions.

examFeatures.title: Full-length Mock Tests
examFeatures.why: Improves time management and exam temperament.

examFeatures.title: Detailed Performance Reports
examFeatures.why: Identifies strong and weak areas for focused study.

examFeatures.title: Quick Revision Notes
examFeatures.why: Helps in quick recall of important concepts and formulas.

examFeatures.title: Career Guidance
examFeatures.benefit: Information on courses and career options.
examFeatures.why: Helps in making informed decisions about your future.

bottomBanner.title: Ace Your ISC Board Exams with Confidence
bottomBanner.subtitle: Structured preparation with expert guidance and comprehensive resources.

additionalInfo.board: CISCE (Council for the Indian School Certificate Examinations)
additionalInfo.passingMarks: Minimum 35% in each subject and in aggregate
